00079     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_wday);
00080   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "year-day")){
00081     return dfsch_make_number_from_long(time->tm.tm_yday + 1);
00082   } else if (dfsch_compare_symbol(selector, "dst?")){
00083     return dfsch_bool(time->tm.tm_isdst == 1);
00084   }
00085 
00086   dfsch_error("exception:no-such-decoded-time-field", selector);
00087 }
